n=input()
for I in range(n):
    a=input()
    c=map(int,raw_input().split())
    l1=[]
    l2=[]
    for i in range(len(c)):
        if c[i]==-1:
            l1.append(-1)
        if c[i]==1:
            l2.append(1)
    for j in l2:
        l1.append(j)
    for i in l1:
        print i,
